newsitem.title: USA: Metatools sees Q4 oper shr of $0.16-$0.17.
newsitem.headline: Metatools sees Q4 oper shr of $0.16-$0.17.

text.p: MetaTools Inc said it expects operating income for the fourth quarter to range from $0.16 to $0.17 per share, before the inclusion of costs from the acquisition of Real Time Geometry Corp.
That compares with earnings of $0.03 per share in the year-ago fourth quarter.
Net income in the just ended fourth quarter will also include a charge of about $14 million related to research and development costs at Real Time Geometry, the company said.
It also expects revenues of about $8.9 million, which is up about 80 percent from last year.

MetaTools, which makes software tools for creating computer graphic images and digital art, said the earnings and sales growth was due to increased licensing and OEM demand for its products. It also cited growth in international markets.
Analysts surveyed by First Call have a consensus estimate of $0.14 per share.
